Breakfast with the Chancellor
Staff Assembly is pleased to announce the return of Breakfast with the Chancellor. A unique opportunity for staff to meet with the Chancellor and fellow campus leaders to discuss topics that impact staff. 
Submit an application








 



Busting Compensation Myths with HR
Human Resources is combating misinformation and debunking some of the most common myths surrounding staff compensation at UC Davis.
Learn more
